sn4.15:1.2: On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling at Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Park.
sn4.15:1.3: Then Māra the Evil One approached the Blessed One and addressed him in verse:
sn4.15:2.1: “There is a snare moving in the sky,
sn4.15:2.3: By means of which I’ll catch you yet:
sn4.15:3.3: Desire for these has vanished in me:
sn4.15:4.1: Then Māra the Evil One … disappeared right there.
